# data
```{r}
lesson1 <- read.csv("rcourse_lesson1_data.txt",sep = "\t")
data_bl <- lesson1 %>% 
  filter(group=="bilingual") %>% 
  filter(rt<1100)

dim(lesson1)
dim(data_bl)
```
# plot
```{r}
data.plot <- lesson1 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=group,y=rt))+
  geom_boxplot()


pdf("figures/data.pdf")
data.plot
#dev.off()
```
